title: Marianna Ikhmalian
subtitle: Analog Photography
name: Name
errorValidEmail: Please enter a valid e-mail address.
messageThankyou: Thank you for your message! I will get in contact with you soon.
aboutParagraphOne: In 2019, I graduated from the Moscow Architectural Institute. I have been working on analogue photography since 2015. The objects of my shooting are portraits and still life.
aboutParagraphTwo: My regular camera is a small format film Pentax K1000. I print my black and white photos using the analogue silver and gelatin process. Each print is unique.
aboutParagraphThree: The works of such photographers as Sally Mann and Diana Arbus are an example for me, where the familiar becomes something special and even scary, and people start playing someone else's role by becoming actors.
aboutParagraphFour: You can support it by buying an author's print from the "Still Life" series.
credentials: I will contact you via the messenger service Telegram or WhatsApp.
dataPrivacy: Under no circumstances will your data be passed on to third parties.
